Unknown.translation: Appearing of kingdoms, rules, grandeurs and glory, comforts and peace;

lines.gurmukhi: kotin kotwin rwg nwid bwd igAwn gun; kotin kotwin jog Bog Eq poiq kY [

Unknown.translation: Despite presence of millions of tunes and melodies of music, classical knowledge, pleasures and relishments integrated like weft and woof,

lines.gurmukhi: kotin kotwin iql mihmw AgwiD boiD; nmo nmo idRsit drs sbd sRoq kY [265[

Unknown.translation: All these glories are paltry. The glory of merging once consciousness in the words of Guru, a glimpse of and a graceful look of the True Guru is beyond expression. Salutations to Him again and again. (265)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: kRoVwˆ qoˆ hI kRoVwˆ mihmw iql quC mwqR hn ijs dy AgwD boD Agy jo kyvl idRStI ivKy drSn dy Aru Sbd ivKy surq dy lIn kIiqAwˆ hI pRwpq huMdw hY[ iqs dy qweIˆ bwrM bwr nmskwr hY ]265]
